General.Name: Allied Circuit Co Ltd
General.Description: Allied Circuit Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells industrial and commercial printed circuit boards (PCB) in Taiwan. It offers high reliability and rigid type multi-layer PCBs, and HDI. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 128, Gong 2nd Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 32559
